page.description: Set the license keys for a TransForm account.

argument.name: licenseKeys
argument.description: A CR-LF delimited list of license keys to set for an Account

return.name: JSON Object
return.description: Returns an object with these properties:

property.name: countLicensesAdded
property.type: count of the number of license keys added to the account</li

section.title: Scope
section.description: The required scope for this method is
CURL for Bash command window or Mac/Linux terminal:

section.title: Node
Xbasic
